name: CreativeMinute
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With useful tips, motivation, creative challenges, answers to your questions and more, Creative Minute will help you get better at expressing yourself one episode at a time!

Whether you're a full-time content creator or just someone who likes to occasionally play around with a camera, this Flash Briefing is a great way to learn, gain new perspectives and insights and take your skills to the next level!

Two episodes per week feature tips regarding editing, camera settings and camera gear, while the other two are dedicated to your questions and a creative challenge.

Sometimes all we need to break out of our creative comfort zone is a little input from outside. Creative Minute is here to give it to you. 
With only around one minute per day, this Flash Briefing will prove to be a worthwhile investment of your time!

Enable it now!

For help, suggestions and any other questions/inquiries, please contact me on Instagram: @leos.lens
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
